bcbioRNASeq

  • News

Select Samples

Select Samples

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
selectSamples(object, ..., transform = TRUE)

# S4 method for DESeqDataSet
selectSamples(object, ...)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments (for the S4 generic definition).
transform

Apply CPU-intensive DESeq2 transformations. This can take a long time for large datasets.

Value

bcbioRNASeq.

Examples

load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "bcb.rda"),
    package = "bcbioRNASeq"))
load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "dds.rda"),
    package = "bcbioRNASeq"))

# bcbioRNASeq
selectSamples(bcb, group = "ko")
#> Updating internal DESeqDataSet
#> estimating size factors
#> estimating dispersions
#> found already estimated dispersions, replacing these
#> gene-wise dispersion estimates
#> mean-dispersion relationship
#> final dispersion estimates
#> fitting model and testing
#> Performing rlog transformation
#> Performing variance stabilizing transformation
#> Performing trimmed mean of M-values (TMM) normalization
#> class: bcbioRNASeq 
#> dim: 505 2 
#> metadata(30): version uploadDir ... subset originalVersion
#> assays(6): raw normalized ... rlog vst
#> rownames(505): ENSMUSG00000002459 ENSMUSG00000004768 ...
#>   ENSMUSG00000105982 ENSMUSG00000109048
#> rowData names(11): ensgene symbol ... seqCoordSystem entrez
#> colnames(2): group2_1 group2_2
#> colData names(4): sampleID sampleName description group

# DESeqDataSet
selectSamples(dds, group = c("ctrl", "ko"))
#> Error in x[, j, drop = FALSE]: no 'dimnames' attribute for array
